column1: '''CRL Group PLC''' was the company that developed ''[[Bored of the Rings (video game)
column2: Bored of the Rings]]''<ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseekid.cgi?id=0006036 Bored of the Rings] at [[Wikipedia:World of Spectrum

column4: World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/boggit.html The Boggit] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref>, which together constitute the ''[[Hairy Toes]]'' series.
